workspace.name: Suppliers
workspace.query: SELECT * FROM SP.Part ORDER By pName LIMIT 100
SELECT sName, pName, color, qty from SP.Supplier s, SP.Part p, SP.Shipment sh WHERE s.sid = sh.sid AND p.pid = sh.pid AND qty > 60 ORDER BY qty LIMIT 10

var op = require("/MarkLogic/optic");
op.fromView("SP", "Shipment") .joinInner(op.fromView("SP", "Part"), op.on( op.schemaCol("SP", "Part", "pid") , op.schemaCol("SP", "Shipment", "pid") )) .joinInner(op.fromView("SP", "Supplier"), op.on( op.schemaCol("SP", "Shipment","sid"), op.schemaCol("SP", "Supplier", "sid") ) ) .select( ["sName", "pName", "color", "qty"] ) .where( op.gt(op.col("qty"), 60)) .limit(10) .orderBy( op.col("qty")) .result()

import module namespace op = "http://marklogic.com/optic" at "/MarkLogic/optic.xqy";
op:from-view("SP", "Shipment") =>op:join-inner(op:from-view("SP", "Part"), op:on( op:schema-col("SP", "Part", "pid") , op:schema-col("SP", "Shipment", "pid") )) =>op:join-inner(op:from-view("SP", "Supplier"), op:on( op:schema-col("SP", "Shipment","sid"), op:schema-col("SP", "Supplier", "sid") ) ) =>op:select( ("sName", "pName", "color", "qty") ) =>op:where( op:gt(op:col("qty"), 60)) =>op:limit(10) =>op:order-by( op:col("qty")) =>op:result()
